sentences: In its report ( FCCC/CP/2006/3 ), the GEF highlighted climate change as the fourth replenishment's highest-ever allocation.
The G-77/China requested that the GEF also report on predictable and available funding for implementation, and said that RAF indicative allocations disadvantage most developing countries.
The EU stressed the RAF's mid-term review.
In its conclusions ( FCCC/SBI/2006/L.30 ), SBI takes note of the GEF report.
